name: 7th Edition of International Conference on Dentistry and Oral Health.” (American Dental 2023)
content: After successful completion of four Editions of Dentistry and Oral health conference, Magnus Group is proud to host the “7th Edition of International Conference on Dentistry and Oral Health.” in a hybrid format taking place during April 27-29, 2023 at Orlando, USA and virtually. The theme chosen for this year is “Blending Today's Lifestyle with Dental Trends for Vibrant Smiles.” and will be dedicated to sharing the recent trends and latest updates and innovations in the field of dentistry and oral health. The consortium proceedings include plenary talks, symposiums and workshops, keynote speeches, poster sessions and panel discussion on latest research developments in the field of dentistry and oral health. The much pared-back line-up of speakers includes healthcare professionals, dentists, dental care experts, oral care specialists, researchers, academicians, scientists and medical students. The finest professionals will deliberate on the latest dental innovation and education from the cutting edge of technology which will be showcased at AMERICAN DENTAL 2023\. It is aimed to benefit the whole dentistry profession by providing high-quality continuing education opportunities and information delivered by highly skilled and experienced keynote speakers. Reach us at: Contact Email: dentistry@magnusconference.com Phone: +1 (702) 988-2320 WhatsApp: +1 434 264 7183 Dates: April 27-29, 2023 Venue: Orlando, USA Website: https://magnusconferences.com/dental/ Abstract submission: https://magnusconferences.com/dental/submit-abstract Registration: https://magnusconferences.com/dental/register Social Media Link: Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/dentalconfer Twitter: https://twitter.com/DentistryOral LinkedIn: YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLtH0EIiRfFWaIOwuYL5IEw Organiser: Magnus Group LLC - https://www.magnusgroup.org/ Conference Manager: Regina Brown Organiser Address: Magnus Group LLC 150 South Wacker Drive #2400 Chicago, IL 60606, USA Dental Conferences | Dental Conferences 2023 | Dentistry Conferences | Dentistry Conferences 2023 | Oral Health Conferences | Oral Health Congress | Dentistry Meetings | Dental Events | American Dental 2023 | Dentistry 2023 | Dentistry Workshops | Dental Summit | Dental Symposium | Oral Health Events | Dental Conference | Dentistry Conference | Oral Health Meetings | Dental Conferences USA | USA Dental Conferences | Online Dental Conferences | Dentistry Webinars | Dental Meetings | Dentistry Events | Oral Health Summit
